# Volcano plot
```{r, fig.caption = "Volcano plot (-log10(adjusted p-value) vs log2(fold change) from linear models"}
linked_scatterplot(
    x = GBMtopTable[["logFC"]],
    xlab = "log<sub>2</sub>(fold-change)",
    y = -log10(GBMtopTable[["adj.P.Val"]]),
    ylab = "-log<sub>10</sub>(FDR-adjusted p-value)",
    xlim = c(-max(abs(GBMtopTable[["logFC"]])), max(abs(GBMtopTable[["logFC"]]))) * 1.1,
    text = GBMtopTable[["Text"]],
    links = GBMtopTable[["Links"]],
    groups = GBMtopTable[["Group"]],
    title = "Glioblastoma - IDH1 mutant vs wt",
    colors = c("#0000ff", "#000000", "#ff0000"))
```
